Author: Deleted User#0000
Content:
Hi here :).
Barterlly is now open on BETA mode, and will provide tools for users and CoinOwners to perform OTC trades in a safe way.
Any KMD assetchain dPowed will be listed, and supported, for free.
Other coins not already listed can submit a listing application at : https://barterlly.typeform.com/to/iqpS1H
During the BETA, Barterlly won't charge any fee other than the transaction ones. after the release we will charge 1% on top of every transaction.
Our goal is to provide premium tools for coins listed on the platform. (Discord swapbot, twitter integration, public orders, wallet integration, API, custom templating, and many more).
Feel free to join us on our Discord.
https://discord.gg/RHc95zw
The app link is located at : https://app.barterlly.io
We are open to suggestions, and partnerships.

See you soon !

Barterlly's team

Author: tomkronx#4305
Content: i think 1% is too much fee huh? should be 0.1% and after 1year or so 1% cuz i think there will be more people out there who will join if there is lower fee

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: considering the $ amount it took to develop barterlly without any public community funding i say it's fair for now. there were huge costs to make it legal as well.

Author: BitcoinTony123#2784
Content: Hello, I was wondering how much it costs to set up an average Smart Chain? Also, do I pay for it to be set up in KMD? Thanks

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@BitcoinTony123 
to setup the smartchains by yourself, there is no cost: https://developers.komodoplatform.com/basic-docs/installations/creating-asset-chains.html

to have the process in the above doc done  automatically, along with various services, we have a blockchain builder coming soon (web portal and aws managed vps used to create the chains), will also have spv servers, explorers etc., - yet to launch, prices to be announced
^^^ all the above can be done as DIY by a capable developer

To add dPoW, there are additional costs

atleast 365 KMD + 365 coin to be notarized + integration costs

Author: BitcoinTony123#2784
Content: Great thanks! is this atleast 365 KMD + 365 coin to be notarized a 1 time payment?

Author: BitcoinTony123#2784
Content: and do you have any estimates on how much integration costs are?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: 365 KMD + 365 coin - per year

Author: BitcoinTony123#2784
Content: Great

Author: BitcoinTony123#2784
Content: Do you have any estimates on how much integration costs are?

Author: BitcoinTony123#2784
Content: Sorry for my persistance, I just want to get it right

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: will let you know in a moment, just asked in internal chat

Author: BitcoinTony123#2784
Content: ok thanks!

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@BitcoinTony123 
the prices are not public currently
but  its currently several thousand dollars for a smart chain (i.e., a chain created using Komodo)

for an external chain that is  a BTC fork, there are additional costs of adding the dPoW code to their coin and a security audit
prices will be made public with the auto blockchain builder coming soon

Author: BitcoinTony123#2784
Content: Great, final question, Is this only payable in KMD?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
365 KMD + 365 coin in their respective coins
integration costs: I think BTC and KMD will be accepted, other forms of payment not sure

Author: BitcoinTony123#2784
Content: Ok thanks for the help
